text: Survived
[Chapter 22a] [Enterance, Shadow Realm Research Center]

speaker: left
text: Wait, there's someone at the enterance.
???: Is someone there?
???: Hm... Are they here to get the Itucher?

speaker: left
text: Wait, is that..

speaker: left
text: No, that's not possible...

speaker: left
text: You there, get out of the way. We're here to get the Holy Itucher but I'd prefer to minimize the violence.
???: Sorry, that's something that I can't do.
???: The sacrifices that I've made to come here... all of these years... I'm not going to be stopped by the likes of you.
???: I, Repins Blaze, shall wield the Holy Itucher.

speaker: left
text: Repins?

speaker: right
text: Wob? Why is he here?

speaker: left
text: Repins? Aren't you... dead?

speaker: right
text: (This group, I remember it now... Wob was there at the Bipole Sea...)

speaker: right
text: I've become a villain, Wob...

speaker: right
text: The things that I've done, they truly are selfish.

speaker: right
text: So forgive me for what I'm going to do...

speaker: left
text: What are you talking about?

speaker: left
text: I don't know what you did or how you're alive, but fighting here won't help anything.

speaker: left
text: You won't be able to get the Itucher on your own, the research center is too secure for that.

speaker: left
text: You can work with us. We can get the Itucher and go back to Static.

speaker: right
text: I want this to be over.

speaker: right
text: I want to go back to when we were all alive, back before the genocide.

speaker: right
text: But that's not possible.

speaker: right
text: Wob, what will happen after you get the Itucher?

speaker: right
text: I wanted to rebuild Quad and live a peaceful life again, but that's not possible anymore.

speaker: right
text: Even if I get the Itucher own my own... you guys won't stop, will you?

speaker: right
text: I won't be able to win a battle against your army...

speaker: right
text: I can't kill you, Wob.

speaker: right
text: Everything that I've done, it really was useless, wasn't it?

speaker: right
text: I give up, I've lost.

speaker: right
text: And with my now failed existence, I'll help you.
[Repins joined your party]
[Sector 1, Shadow Realm Research Center]
???: It seems we may have some intruders.
???: I wonder why they're here... is it because of the Holy Itucher...
???: But how could they have found out? Did they defeat Bladeous?
???: Well, let's see how they do against us.
[Bonus Conversation Unlocked]

speaker: left
text: You've come from the Continent of Bipole, correct?

speaker: right
text: Yes.

speaker: left
text: How have things been back there?

speaker: left
text: I haven't been to the continent in 10 years.

speaker: right
text: You've been to the Bipole Continent?

speaker: left
text: Yes, I was actually from the Bipole continent.

speaker: left
text: After the Quad Genocide though, I fled from Quad and joined a mercenary group to survive.

speaker: left
text: And after the mercenaries did an voyage to Nolavillia, I've been here ever since.

speaker: left
text: Dliug and Exa are also from Nolavillia, though I don't know why they've joined the mercenaries.
[Yranecrem and Proton leveled up!]

speaker: left
text: Hmmm, what's this? It looks like a box...

speaker: right
text: Wait, I think I can open the box.

speaker: right
text: Look at the hole in the wall next to where the box is.

speaker: right
text: There's something that looks like a button at the other end.

speaker: right
text: Now if I use my bow...
(Fael shoots the button and the box glows red)

speaker: right
text: Ummm... is that supposed to happen?
(The box unfolds and reveals that it is a mechanical entity)
???: Freedom, finally...
???: Now, it is time to get revenge on that Death Pepper... but it seems like you're also on you're way to do that...
???: In that case, I suppose I'll have to take my revenge along side you... this won't be a problem, will it?
[Ahcem joins your party!]
